Flushing the toilet would make a hot shower immediately cold or vice versa. If you don't understand the Predator or Alien series then I can't help you there.

> [{quoted}](name=CastawayTomHanks,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=9xsQb7Ev,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-08-03T01:58:02.905+0000)
>
> Flushing the toilet would make a hot shower immediately cold or vice versa. If you don't understand the Predator or Alien series then I can't help you there.

Why? Doesn't do that at my home.
Only time water gets a bit hotter is when the washing machine is on. And we're still talking 3-5Â°

In older houses the plumbing in the bathroom toilet and shower would be connected (both shouldn't be used at the same time), I'm no plumber but there isn't enough water pressure to share, and only one can access the water heater at a time (I think)

Kha took Rengar's eye...but what did Rengar take? 

The sanctity of a warm shower.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
As a rengar main I disapprove.. I think they hate me because their bot lane doesn't ward.

As someone you use to main support, adc's don't help ward. (I averaged dropping 1 ward per minute when I did)

Supports have it hard man... Your job to engage because adc is a pussy your job to tank even if you are janna or soraka your job to poke in lane your job to ward your job to roam... might as well be your job to do everything and let the adc last hit champions
That's the main reason I picked up Bard. Here's some healing pods, I'm going to help some one that will follow up with me.
